execution_notes.kernel_compatibility_issue: DAG equations use descriptive f(...) notation instead of executable Python
execution_notes.workaround_method: Simplified DCF calculation using ENRICH parameters from A5/A6
execution_notes.calculation_methodology: 20-year explicit period DCF with staged discount rates (22% Y1-3, 19% Y4, 15% Y5+), Year 4 divestiture proceeds BRL 540M at 0.65x multiple, SaaS growth 24% CAGR

enrich_t2_summary.primary_driver_of_decline: DR increase 20% → 22% (reduces PV of near-term cash flows by 8-10%)
enrich_t2_summary.secondary_driver: Divestiture delay Year 2 → Year 4 (increases liquidity risk and execution uncertainty)
enrich_t2_summary.tertiary_driver: SaaS growth 25% → 24% CAGR (modest reduction in terminal value)
key_risks: Severe liquidity crisis (covenant breach 60-70% probability Q2 2026 per RQ7)
CPaaS divestiture NOT in progress (no LOI, no buyer per RQ7)
Cash runway 3.9-10.9 months insufficient to reach Year 4 divestiture (RQ7)
SaaS product-market fit WEAK-to-MEDIUM (analyst absence, competitive gaps per RQ6)
